title: Please help me identify this cursive style font..
content:
Hello everyone. I'm new to the forum and am hopeful someone here will be able to help me identify a font. I've included a screenshot (please disregard the crap editing, I was trying to remove a flash that washed out a few of the letters) This seems like a really great community. Thank you for taking the time to read this and any for your help in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015104311im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_6414.JPG)
author: Mallion
